title: Why does my game keep bug splatting
body:
Every time i try to enter game it bug splats. 
I've reinstalled LOL 5 times, and it still doesnt work

replies.body: hey I have the exact same problem. I reinstalled, tried to repair, and even updated my drivers but every time I try to go in a game it still bug splats

Can you provide any more context as to what may have recently changed? Did you recently change out your video card or monitor? If nothing was changed (to your knowledge) recently, then this is likely caused by a driver or hardware issue, in which case, I recommend working through the steps listed in our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps resolved the issue for you.
I'm having the same exact problem wanted to try the snow day graves skin I just bought and I keep getting bug splatted and I probably got banned :(
